item.title: About
item.description: Hi there My name is Karanveer and I’m the author of this blog. I’m a software developer who enjoys working with many languages. Currently, I’m working with Python with a little bit of Java. Having learned so much from others, this blog is my effort to share what I know with the world. You can find my github page here. I also have a deep interest in drawing and painting and you can see some of my sketches on this instagram page.
